message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  $9000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get closer to my asking price of $9500.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9250. This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find the product worth that investment.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to go up to $9100 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to me.
